page.title: 01THE AREA IN GENERAL
page.content: The main villages in this area of rural Hertfordshire are{Great {Gaddesden & Nettleden.} In these villages the main industry is FARMING due to the large amount of open land in this area. However, a large amount of the inhabitants in this area are also COMMUTERS. On the outskirts of Nettleden there is a large amount of land which is{NATIONAL TRUST}property which is being used to conserve the country's heritage. In these villages there is often a lack of AMENITIES but generally most villages have a village shop or a post-office. Great Gaddesden is well equipped with a school, nursery, Church, Buddhist monastery, football pitch and riding school.
